00031 namespace wave {
00032   namespace chunk {
00033     // chunks are read in by using
00034     template<typename T>
00035     T readT(std::istream& is) {
00036       T data;
00037       is.read((char *)(&data), sizeof(T));
00038       if (!is) throw std::runtime_error("read failed");
00039       return data;
00040     }
00041 
00042     class header {
00043     public:
00044       typedef boost::shared_ptr<header> sptr;
00045       header(std::string id="XXXX",
00046              size_t size=0)
00047         : size_(size) {
00048         std::copy(id.begin(), id.begin()+std::min(size_t(4), id.size()), &id_[0]);
00049       }      
00050       std::string      id() const   { return std::string(id_, id_+4); }
00051       boost::uint32_t  size() const { return size_; }
00052       boost::uint32_t& size()       { return size_; }
00053 
00054       friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const header& h) {
00055         return os << "id=" << h.id() << " size=" << h.size();
00056       }
00057     private:
00058       boost::uint8_t  id_[4];
00059       boost::uint32_t size_;
00060     } ;
00061     
00062     class riff : public header {
00063     public:
00064       typedef boost::shared_ptr<riff> sptr;
00065       riff(size_t size=0)
00066         : header("RIFF", size) {
00067         std::string id2("WAVE");
00068         std::copy(id2.begin(), id2.begin()+std::min(size_t(4), id2.size()), &id2_[0]);
00069       }
00070 
00071       std::string id2() const { return std::string(id2_, id2_+4); }
00072 
00073       friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const riff& r) {
00074         return os << header(r) << " id2=" << r.id2();
00075       }
00076       bool ok() const { return id() == "RIFF" && id2() == "WAVE"; }
00077     private:
00078       boost::uint8_t id2_[4]; 
00079     } ;
00080     
00081     class format : public header {
00082     public:
00083       typedef boost::shared_ptr<format> sptr;
00084       format(boost::uint32_t sampleRate=1,
00085              boost::uint16_t bitsPerSample=16,
00086              boost::uint16_t numChannels=2)
00087         : header("fmt ", sizeof(format)-8)
00088         , audioFormat_(1)      // PCM format
00089         , numChannels_(numChannels)
00090         , sampleRate_(sampleRate)
00091         , bytesPerSecond_(numChannels*sampleRate*bitsPerSample/8)
00092         , bytesPerSample_(numChannels*bitsPerSample/8)
00093         , bitsPerSample_(bitsPerSample) {}
00094 
00095       boost::uint16_t audioFormat() const { return audioFormat_; }
00096       boost::uint16_t numChannels() const { return numChannels_; }
00097       boost::uint32_t sampleRate() const { return sampleRate_; }
00098       boost::uint32_t bytesPerSecond() const { return bytesPerSecond_; }
00099       boost::uint16_t bytesPerSample() const { return bytesPerSample_; }
00100       boost::uint16_t bitsPerSample() const { return bitsPerSample_; }
00101       bool ok() const { return id() == "fmt "; }
00102 
00103       void changeSampleRate(boost::uint32_t newSampleRate) {
00104         sampleRate_    =  newSampleRate;
00105         // only bytesPerSecond needs to be updated
00106         bytesPerSecond_ = numChannels()*sampleRate()*bitsPerSample()/8;
00107       }
00108 
00109       friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const format& f) {
00110         return os << header(f)
00111                   << " audioFormat=" << f.audioFormat()
00112                   << " numChannels=" << f.numChannels()
00113                   << " sampleRate=" << f.sampleRate()
00114                   << " bytesPerSecond=" << f.bytesPerSecond()
00115                   << " bytesPerSample=" << f.bytesPerSample()
00116                   << " bitsPerSample=" << f.bitsPerSample();
00117       }
00118     private:
00119       boost::uint16_t audioFormat_;
00120       boost::uint16_t numChannels_;
00121       boost::uint32_t sampleRate_;
00122       boost::uint32_t bytesPerSecond_;
00123       boost::uint16_t bytesPerSample_;
00124       boost::uint16_t bitsPerSample_;
00125     } ;

00127     class rcvr : public header {
00128     public:
00129       typedef boost::shared_ptr<rcvr> sptr;
00130       
00131       rcvr(boost::uint32_t nCenterFrequencyHz=0,
00132            boost::uint32_t nSamplingRateIdx=0,
00133            time_t          timeStart=0,
00134            boost::uint8_t  wAttenId=0,
00135            boost::uint8_t  bAdcPresel=0,
00136            boost::uint8_t  bAdcPreamp=0,
00137            boost::uint8_t  bAdcDither=0) 
00138         : header("rcvr", sizeof(rcvr)-8)
00139         , nCenterFrequencyHz_(nCenterFrequencyHz)
00140         , nSamplingRateIdx_(nSamplingRateIdx)
00141         , timeStart_(timeStart)
00142         , wAttenId_(wAttenId)
00143         , bAdcPresel_(bAdcPresel)
00144         , bAdcPreamp_(bAdcPreamp)
00145         , bAdcDither_(bAdcDither)
00146         , bSpare_(0) {
00147         for (size_t i=0; i<16; ++i) rsrvd_[i]=0;
00148       }
00149       boost::uint32_t nCenterFrequencyHz() const { return nCenterFrequencyHz_; }
00150       boost::uint32_t nSamplingRateIdx() const { return nSamplingRateIdx_; }
00151       boost::posix_time::ptime ptimeStart() const { return boost::posix_time::from_time_t(timeStart_); }
00152       boost::uint16_t wAttenId() const { return wAttenId_; }
00153       boost::uint8_t  bAdcPresel() const { return bAdcPresel_; }
00154       boost::uint8_t  bAdcPreamp() const { return bAdcPreamp_; }
00155       boost::uint8_t  bAdcDither() const { return bAdcDither_; }
00156       boost::uint8_t  bSpare() const { return bSpare_; }
00157       std::string     rsrvd() const { return std::string(rsrvd_, rsrvd_+16); }
00158 
00159       bool ok() const { return id() == "rcvr"; }
00160       
00161       friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const rcvr& r) {
00162         os << header(r) 
00163            << " nCenterFrequencyHz=" << r.nCenterFrequencyHz()
00164            << " nSamplingRateIdx=" << r.nSamplingRateIdx()
00165            << " ptimeStart=" << r.ptimeStart()
00166            << " wAttenId=" << r.wAttenId()
00167            << " bAdcPresel=" << int(r.bAdcPresel())
00168            << " bAdcPreamp=" << int(r.bAdcPreamp())
00169            << " bAdcDither=" << int(r.bAdcDither())
00170            << " bSpare=" << int(r.bSpare())
00171            << " rsvrd="; std::copy(r.rsrvd_, r.rsrvd_+16, std::ostream_iterator<int>(os, " "));
00172         return os;
00173       }
00174     private:
00175       boost::uint32_t    nCenterFrequencyHz_; // center freq in Hz
00176       boost::uint32_t    nSamplingRateIdx_;   // 0=125k, 1=250k, 2=500k, 1 M 
00177       time_t             timeStart_;          // UTC rec time init
00178       boost::uint16_t    wAttenId_;           // 0=0dB, 1=10dB, 2=20dB, 3=30dB
00179       boost::uint8_t     bAdcPresel_;         // 0=Presel Off, 1=Presel On
00180       boost::uint8_t     bAdcPreamp_;         // 0=ADC Preamp Off, 1=ADC Preamp ON
00181       boost::uint8_t     bAdcDither_;         // 0=ADC Dither Off, 1=ADC Dither ON
00182       boost::uint8_t     bSpare_;             // for future use (default = 0)
00183       boost::uint8_t     rsrvd_[16];          // for future use (default = 000..0)
00184     } ;
00185     
00186     class data: public header {
00187     public:
00188       typedef boost::shared_ptr<data> sptr;
00189       data()
00190         : header("data") {}
00191 
00192       friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const data& d) {
00193         return os << header(d);
00194       }
00195       bool ok() const { return id() == "data"; }
00196     } ;
